00031 /*
00032  * Name:    VoiceUssdTlv
00033  *
00034  * Purpose: Structure used to store all VoiceUssdTlv TLV Value
00035  *
00036  * Members: TlvPresent         - Boolean indicating the presence of the TLV
00037  *                               in the QMI response
00038  *
00039  *          Notification_Type  - 0x01 - No action required
00040  *                               0x02 - Action required
00041  *
00042  *          NetworkInfo        - USSD information from the network
00043  *                               See qaGobiApiVoice.h for more info.
00044  *
00045  * Note:    None
00046  */

00051     struct USSInfo NetworkInfo;
00052 };
